thread.title: Finnish hackers discover a serious security flaw in hotel key system

title: Finnish hackers discover a serious security flaw in hotel key system
text:
Finnish hackers discover a serious security flaw in hotel key system 01:49
By getting hold of a widely used hotel key card, an attacker could create a master key to unlock any room in the building without leaving a trace, Finnish security researchers said in a study published on Wednesday, solving a 14-year-old mystery. Jim Drury reports.
